articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Asian Indoor Athletics: Toor, Jyothi, Harmilan bag gold - Rediff.com
articles.description: Ace shot putter Tajinderpal Singh Toor and hurdler Jyothi Yarraji rewrote their national records, while long distance sensation Harmilan Bains sizzled on the track.
articles.content:
IMAGE: Jyothi Yarraji bettered her own national record by clocking 8.12s in the women's 60m hurdles to win the gold. Photograph: Reliance Foundation
